title.narrative: Procurement of services for Maternal and Newborn Child Health Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of services for Maternal and Newborn Child Health Programme) is a component of Maternal and Newborn Child Health Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £86,947,015. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Medical research, Basic health care, Health education, Reproductive health care, Family planning, Personnel development for population and reproductive health. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly Nigeria, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-01-2014 and the end date is 30-04-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Personnel development for population and reproductive health
